lead_paragraph: Luca Paolini of Italy won the 12th stage of the Spanish Vuelta yesterday, and Alejandro Valverde of Spain remained the overall leader. Paolini covered the 105 miles from Aranda de Duero to Guadalajara in 3 hours 35 minutes 7 seconds.
snippet: Luca Paolini of Italy won the 12th stage of the Spanish Vuelta yesterday, and Alejandro Valverde of Spain remained the overall leader. Paolini covered the 105 miles from Aranda de Duero to Guadalajara in 3 hours 35 minutes 7 seconds.
